root.name: The Sewer Goblet: The Wu-Tang Clan and the Wu-Tang Baby
root.description: OverviewWhile Raekwon and Ghostface toss a football around, the rest of the crew is inside watching the game. Suddenly, the door knocks and they find a baby with a mysterious amulet around it. They decide to adopt this baby and call him "The Wu-Tang Baby."This amulet-clad baby was, in fact, sought after by an evil wizard who lurks in the sewers. Upon getting stolen by one of the wizard's henchman, the Cheese Panda XD, the Wu-Tang Clan must find his lair and rescue the Wu-Tang Baby.GameplayA roguelike at its core, the player takes turns to complete movement, combat, and other actions while the enemies take their own turns. The dungeons are randomly generated with randomly generated items, as well as monsters.Linksa href="http://talesofgames.com/" Official Site/a
